title.en: In the Bizarre Invasion, I Took Over the Body of the God of Death and Became the King

altTitles.zh-ro: Guǐyì Rùqīn, Wǒ Duó Shě Sǐshén Nì Xí Chēng Wáng

altTitles.en: Strange Invasion, I Took Over the God of Death and Counterattacked to Become the King

altTitles.zh: 诡异入侵我夺舍死神逆袭称王
诡异入侵，我夺舍死神逆袭称王

altTitles.en: Weird Invasion, I Took over the Body of the Grim Reaper and Became the King

description.en: Su Mu is reborn and re-enters the “Apocalypse” system, facing deadly situations where Death itself comes knocking and an array of demons and eerie creatures awaken to threaten the world. Against all odds, he turns the tables and becomes an unstoppable king, joining his teammates in a desperate fight to reverse their fate and ignite a nationwide awakening and evolution.

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…
description.zh: 星球死亡，众神陨落。“异常”与“灾祸”入侵人类世界。黑暗时代来临之际，沈夜穿越到这个异世界，惊奇得发现，自己的异能是召唤出一扇门，这扇门通往诸天万界，可以去不同世界冒险历练！他在门的另一边，结识了一具身份来历成迷的骷髅……
description.pt-br: Planetas morrendo, deuses caindo. “Anomalias” e “Calamidades” invadem o mundo humano. À medida que a era das trevas se aproxima, Shen Ye se vê lançado nesta estranha nova realidade. Para sua surpresa, seu poder é invocar uma porta – uma porta que leva a incontáveis ​​mundos, oferecendo-lhe a chance de se aventurar e treinar através do multiverso! Além da porta, ele encontra um esqueleto misterioso com um passado desconhecido...

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

altTitles.pt-br: Começando a Evolução com uma Grande Árvore

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？
description.pt-br: Renascido como um Salgueiro mutante Yu Zi Yu agora enfrenta os perigos de ser uma árvore em uma floresta enquanto também se aproveita de um sistema evolutivo. Será que Yu Zi Yu vai conseguir superar as adversidades e se tornar algo como uma Yggdrasil? A épica história de um reencarnado como árvore começa agora.

title.en: Yuusha-sama no Osananajimi to Iu Settei no Make Heroine ni Tensei shita no de, Chougoushi ni Job Change Shimasu

altTitles.ja: 勇者様の幼馴染という職業の負けヒロインに転生したので、調合師にジョブチェンジします。
勇者様の幼馴染という職業（せってい）の負けヒロインに転生したので、調合師にジョブチェンジします。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama no Osananajimi to Iu Shokugyou no Make Heroine ni Tensei shita no de, Chougou-shi ni Job Change shimasu

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as the Hero's Childhood Friend Who Was the Losing Love Interest, so I Changed Jobs to Alchemist
Because I Reincarnated as the Loser Heroine Whose Profession Is the Brave's Childhood Friend, I'll Change My Job to Alchemist
I Reincarnated as a Hero’s Childhood Friend Who Lost Her Job as a Heroine, so I Changed Jobs to Alchemist
I Reincarnated as a Losing Heroine, the Hero’s Childhood Friend Who Lost to the Main Heroine, so I Switched Jobs to Alchemist

altTitles.ru: Так как я переродилась в Героиню-неудачницу, чья роль – быть подругой детства Храбреца, я поменяю мою работу на алхимика

altTitles.ko: 용사님의 소꿉친구라는 직업의 패배 히로인으로 전생해서, 조합사로 전직합니다

altTitles.zh: 因为转生成了勇者青梅竹马的败犬女主角、所以要转职成为药剂师

description.en: As the monster's teeth drew near, it was then that I remembered. "I've witnessed this scene before." This was the world of an RPG I played in my previous life. And I, as the main character's childhood friend, was the losing love interest who would be turned down by him in the future. The childhood friend whose role ended one hour into the opening after confessing to the main character as he was about to set off into his journey. The one many players sympathized with as the main character would meet another girl who would cling onto him during his journey. If I remain in this village, in the future I'll be the losing love interest?! To prevent that from happening, I'll leave the village and make use of my newly blossomed ability in compounds with becoming an alchemist at the royal capital as my aim. I don't give a damn about some job that requires me to be the main character's childhood friend. I'll be seizing happiness with my own hands!
description.fr: Alors que les dents du monstre se rapprochaient, c'est alors que je me souvins. «J'ai déjà été témoin de cette scène.» C'était le monde d'un RPG auquel j'ai joué dans ma vie précédente. Et moi, en tant qu'ami d'enfance du personnage principal, j'étais l'amoureuse perdante qui sera rejeté par lui à l'avenir. L'ami d'enfance dont le rôle s'est terminé une heure après le début du jeu, après avoir avoué mes sentiments au personnage principal alors qu'il était sur le point de se lancer dans son voyage. Celui avec lequel de nombreux joueurs sympathisaient en tant que personnage principal rencontrerait une autre fille qui s'attacherai à lui pendant son voyage. Si je reste dans ce village, à l'avenir je serai l'amoureuse perdante?! Pour éviter que cela ne se produise, je vais quitter le village et utiliser une nouvelle capacité que j'ai acquise avec comme objectif de devenir alchimiste dans la capitale royale. Je me fous d'un travail qui m'oblige à être l'ami d'enfance du personnage principal. Je vais saisir le bonheur de mes propres mains!
description.id: Saat gigi monster itu mendekat, saat itulah aku ingat. "Saya telah menyaksikan adegan ini sebelumnya." Ini adalah dunia RPG yang kumainkan di kehidupanku sebelumnya. Dan aku, sebagai teman masa kecil tokoh utama, adalah kehilangan minat cinta yang akan ditolak olehnya di masa depan. Teman masa kecil yang perannya berakhir satu jam ke pembukaan setelah mengakui karakter utama saat ia akan berangkat ke perjalanannya. Satu-satunya pemain yang bersimpati sebagai tokoh utama akan bertemu gadis lain yang akan menempel padanya selama perjalanannya. Jika aku tetap di desa ini, di masa depan aku akan kehilangan minat cinta?! Untuk mencegah hal itu terjadi, aku akan meninggalkan desa dan memanfaatkan kemampuan baru saya berkembang dalam senyawa dengan menjadi seorang alkemis di ibukota kerajaan sebagai tujuan saya. Saya tidak peduli tentang beberapa pekerjaan yang mengharuskan saya untuk menjadi teman masa kecil tokoh utama. Aku akan merebut kebahagiaan dengan tanganku sendiri!

altTitles.ja: 心春 Hush-A-Bye 真夜中のカウンセラー

description.en: Clinical psychologist Koharu Ninomiya will guide you to a 'peaceful sleep.'

title.en: Abnormal Immortal Record of Spooky Daoist

description.en:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”
description.vi: Học sinh trung học Lý Hỏa Vượng sở hữu khả năng chỉ cần nhắm mắt là có thể đi đến một thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái. Trong thế giới kỳ quái đó, cậu bị một người được gọi là "Sư phụ" bắt đi làm một dược nhân, có thể bị luyện thành đan dược bất cứ lúc nào. Còn trong thế giới thực, Lý Hỏa Vượng là một bệnh nhân tâm thần sống trong bệnh viện tâm thần, không thể đi học được nữa. Bác sĩ nói với cậu rằng, thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái đó chỉ là ảo giác của cậu mà thôi. Giờ đây, thật thật giả giả, giả giả thật thật, Lý Hỏa Vượng bật khóc trong tuyệt vọng và hét lên: “Mẹ ơi, con thật sự không phân biệt nổi nữa!
description.pt-br: Li Huowang, um estudante do ensino médio, possui uma habilidade peculiar: sempre que fecha os olhos, ele entra em um mundo de cultivo bizarro. Nesse mundo estranho, ele é capturado por alguém que o chama de “Mestre” e acaba transformado em uma medicina viva — um humano…

description.en: "The world will become your enemy if you descend into Jianghu..." The young patriarch of a declining family, Baek Mujin, prepares for a journey into the outside world to restore his family's fortunes. Despite the foreseen future where the world will stand as his enemy, Mujin begins his lonely battle.

In the final battle against the Demon Cult, the Black Serpent leader Jeonghwa was betrayed by the Murim Alliance, losing all her comrades. Barely surviving, she swears to eliminate both the Demon Cult and the Murim Alliance who drove her comrades to their deaths. “Heavens! If justice truly exists… grant me the opportunity to avenge my fallen comrades!”

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

altTitles.zh: 凍てついた世界の黙示録

altTitles.zh-ro: Bing Feng Mo Ri: Jue Wu Sheng Huan Zhi Lu

altTitles.en: Frozen Apocalypse: No Chance of Survival
Frozen Armageddon: There’s No Way Back
Frozen Doomsday: No Way to Survive

altTitles.zh-ro: Bīng Fēng Mò Rì: Jué Wú Shēng Huán Zhī Lù

altTitles.zh: 冰封末日：绝无生还之路
凍てついた世界の黙示録

description.en: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

altTitles.ja: 京兼家の花嫁

altTitles.en: The Bride of the Kyougane Clan

description.en:
The "Kyokane family" is a prestigious family of degenerate magicians that has been in existence for a thousand years. The current head of the family, the eccentric KYOKANE Kuroro, is brought to a bride who has a "secret" behind her pretty appearance,
A bride with a "secret" behind her pretty appearance...?

If you decide to "live together," break off the yoke, the causality, and everything else, and be together!

This marriage battle fantasy, written in a clear and elegant style, is about to begin!
description.ru:
Достопочтенный клан Кëганэ тысячу лет занимался изгнанием демонов. И его нынешний глава, эксцентричный Кëганэ Куро принял невесту, скрывающую большой «секрет»?! Он разрубит ëкаев и саму судьбу ради своего «долго и счастливо»!
Мы представляем вам восхитительно написанное супружеское боевое фэнтези!
description.vi: Gia tộc "Kyougane", gia tộc Pháp Sư Diệt Quỷ huyền thoại đã tiêu diệt cửu vĩ từ hàng nghìn năm trước. Kyoukane Kurou, người đứng đầu gia tộc bây giờ với hàng tá tai tiếng phải lấy vợ. Nhưng cô vợ này không tầm thường và có vài "bí mật" đằng sau vẻ đẹp kiều diễm đó...?

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: ウイニング パス

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

title.en: Jitsu wa Imouto deshita. ~Saikin Dekita Giri no Otouto no Kyorikan ga Yatara Chikai Wake~

altTitles.ja: じつは義妹でした。～最近できた義理の弟の距離感がやたら近いわけ～

altTitles.en: She Was Actually My Stepsister.: Recently, the Sense of Distance Between Me and My New Stepbrother Is Incredibly Close

altTitles.id: Dia Sebenarnya Adik Perempuanku ~Baru-baru ini, Jarak Antara Diriku dan Adik Laki-lakiku Semakin Dekat~

altTitles.ru: На самом деле она была моей сводной сестрой

altTitles.es-la: En realidad era mi hermanastra ~Recientemente, la sensación de distancia entre mi nuevo hermanastro y yo es increíblemente cercana~

description.en:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202111jitsuimo)
description.ja: 親の再婚で、高校生の俺にできた義理の弟・晶。複雑な家庭環境で育ったせいで、美少年だけど人見知り。兄「弟」に憧れていた俺は、晶といつも一緒に遊んで過ごしていたけど、じつは俺たちは兄「妹」だと判明し…!?
description.es-la: ¿Una relación secreta entre un hermano y su hermana pequeña? ¡Comienza una comedia romántica entre hermanos con un malentendido! Akira, mi hermanastro, llegó a mi vida después de que mis padres se volvieran a casar. Es un chico lindo pero tímido debido al entorno familiar donde creció. ¡Nos llevamos bien, y le pregunté: "Hermano, ¿te gusto por casualidad?" "Por supuesto que sí". El malentendido entre los dos se profundiza. Y finalmente, me di cuenta de que Akira era mi "hermana" y me confundí... El acercamiento de Akira a mí, con el objetivo de convertirnos en "amantes" en lugar de "hermanos", ¡ha comenzado! ¡Una coqueta comedia romántica con una hermana pequeña que es demasiado linda y despreocupada!
description.pt-br:
***Um relacionamento secreto de irmão mais novo com sua irmã mais nova?! Começa uma comédia romântica entre irmãos com um mal-entendido!**

Akira, meu meio-irmão, entrou em minha vida quando era estudante do ensino médio, depois que meus pais se casaram novamente. Ele é um menino fofo, mas tímido por causa do ambiente familiar complicado em que cresceu. Eu tinha uma queda pelo meu irmão, então sempre passava um tempo brincando com Akira por causa dele…. Ele me ama… Nós nos demos bem e a distância entre nós cresceu rapidamente! Eu perguntei a ele,
"Mano, você gosta de mim por acaso?"
"Claro que sim."
O mal-entendido entre nós dois se aprofunda. E finalmente, percebi que Akira era minha “irmã” e fiquei confuso...
"Gosto da distância entre meu irmão e eu, como sempre estivemos. Prefiro estar com você mais do que estou agora."
A abordagem de Akira para mim, com o objetivo de nos tornar “amantes” em vez de “irmãos”, já começou!
Uma comédia romântica sedutora com uma irmã mais nova que é muito fofa e despreocupada para ser irmão!

description.en:
"Do you know that the cherry blossoms are so beautiful because of the corpses buried under them?"  
  
Teenaged Subaru Sumeragi is the 13th head of the Sumeragi clan. Together with his twin sister Hokuto and the   
mysterious veterinarian Seishirou, Subaru travels around Tokyo, calming the ghosts that threaten the city.
description.ja: 除霊を生業とする陰陽師・皇昴流が、東京を舞台に事件を解決。彼を支えるのは双子の姉・北都と、暗殺集団の跡取りという顔を隠す桜塚星史郎――。

description.en: Momoka has become a woman nearing her thirties with zero romance experience. Frustrated by this situation, she discovers the existence of "lesbian sex services" while searching for online encounters. Momoka decides to use it, interested in having sex with a lesbian sex worker called "Riko." Riko agrees to meet her, but has a secret …?

altTitles.ja: バナナフィッシュ

description.en: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja: 悪霊 シュトヘル

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

altTitles.ja-ro: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか　～メモリア・フレーゼ～　聖夜の夢想歌

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick up Girls in a Dungeon? Memoria Freese

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье? Воспоминания Фриз

description.en: Manga based on DanMachi mobile game - MEMORIA FREESE

Ha Do-wan is a bullied gamer, whose bullies force him to grind to obtain in-game items for them. 

After one such bully demands that Dowan obtain an impossibly rare item for him or be beaten in front of the prettiest girl in school, Dowan games day and night for a week until he drops dead from exhaustion. 

However, as soon as he dies, he respawns back in his classroom one week before his death. Everything is the same as it was before, except now he has all the skills he’s acquired from the games he’s played in real life! 

Will Dowan be able to use his newfound abilities and gamified existence to defeat his bullies?
description.fr: À cause de la menace des harceleurs de son école qui l'obligent à gagner des objets dans un jeu, Ha Do-Wan, le malheureux joueur à tout faire, est mort après avoir joué sans arrêt pendant une semaine. Au moment où il est mort, il s'est fait réincarner dans sa salle de classe une semaine avant sa mort... Tout est comme ce jour-là. La seule chose qui a changé est cette fenêtre volante devant lui ! Quoi ? Utiliser les skills que j'ai utilisé dans tous les jeux auxquels j'ai pu jouer jusqu'ici pour battre les harceleurs ?!?!
description.ko:
게임 아이템을 가져오라는 일진의 협박으로 인해일주일간 밤샘 게임을 하다 죽음을 맞이한 비운의 게임셔틀 하도완그 순간 일주일 전 교실에서 리스폰되는데...

모든 것이 그날과 똑같다. 달라진 것은 단 하나, 눈앞에 떠있는 <퀘스트 알림>!

뭐? 내가 지금껏 하던 게임들의 스킬을 이용해서 일진을 때려잡으라고?!
description.ru: После угроз и запугиваний школьного хулигана, который требовал добыть предметы, Ха До Ван всю неделю проводит ночи напролет за играми, умирает и перерождается в школьном кабинете за неделю до этого... Все было точно таким же, как в тот день. Изменилось только одно - это "Оповещение о квесте", которое всплыло перед глазами! Что? От меня требуется победить этого хулигана, используя все мои игровые навыки?
description.pt-br: Após ser forçado pelo valentão da escola a dropar um item lendário, Ha Dowan, o escravo gamer, morre depois de passar a sete dias seguidos jogando. No momento de sua morte, ele renasce na sala de aula, uma semana antes do dia em que morreu. Tudo está exatamente igual àquele dia. A única coisa diferente é que a <notificação de missão> está flutuando na frente dele! “O quê? tenho que usar as habilidades de todos os jogos que joguei até hoje pra descer o cacete nesse desgraçado?!”

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

title.en: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node, Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~

altTitles.ja: 王都の外れの錬金術師 ～ハズレ職業だったので、のんびりお店経営します～

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Little Alchemist Blessed by the Spirits

description.en:
Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist!

The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.
description.ja: 名門魔導師の家系に生まれたのに、ハズレ職の「錬金術師」を与えられてしまったデイジー。が、希少な「鑑定」スキルを持ち、精霊の加護を受ける彼女にとっては天職だった…!?

altTitles.ja: 新世紀エヴァンゲリオン

description.en: In 2015, the "Angels" have returned, and Shinji Ikari, a fourteen year-old child of the new Earth, is forced by his father – Gendo, commander of the secret organization NERV – to pilot the monstrous biomechanical weapon called "Evangelion" to match the Angels' fearsome power…
description.fr:
En l'an 2000, une gigantesque explosion se produit en Antarctique, provoquant un cataclysme qui dévaste une grande partie de la planète. Quinze ans plus tard, l'Humanité a surmonté cet événement, appelé le Second Impact. Mais de mystérieuses créatures nommées Anges font leur apparition, et tentent de détruire Tokyo-3, la nouvelle capitale-forteresse du Japon construite après le Second Impact. Pour les combattre, l'organisation secrète NERV a mis au point une arme ultime, "l'Evangelion" géant anthropoïde piloté comme une simple mécanique, mais en réalité créature bien mystérieuse.   
Shinji Ikari, jeune garçon de 14 ans, se rend à Tokyo-3 sur invitation de son père, qu'il n'a pas revu depuis 10 ans. Il est loin de se douter qu'il sera impliqué dans un conflit qui pourrait bien signifier la fin de l'humanité quoi qu'il arrive…

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Phiêu Lưu Kỳ Bí của JoJo Phần 9: The JOJOLands

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

description.uk: Після прийняття закону про заборону тілесних покарань у 2011 році, в школах почався суцільний безлад. Учні вчинили масовий переворот, змінивши шкільний устрій, а працівники учбових закладів втратити свій авторитет. На Хваджін, член Бюро захисту освіти, починає «реальну освіту», щоб встановити порядок.
description.pt-br: As técnicas de ensino de Hwajin Na são bastante violentas para quem trabalha no Ministério da Educação. Dito isso, quando as punições não parecem funcionar nem mesmo com o pior dos valentões da escola, não há homem melhor para o trabalho. Às vezes, você não pode obter uma boa educação até que esses valentões aprendam uma lição.

altTitles.ja: 光が死んだ夏

altTitles.de: Der Sommer, in dem Hikaru starb

altTitles.th: หน้าร้อนที่ฮิคารุจากไป

altTitles.pt-br: O verão em que Hikaru morreu

altTitles.es: El verano en que Hikaru murió

altTitles.it: L’estate in cui Hikaru è morto

description.en:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...

[Yen Press English Simulpub](https://yenpress.com/series/the-summer-hikaru-died-manga-serial)
description.fr: Hikaru et Yoshiki sont deux amis d'enfance qui ont grandi ensemble dans un hameau reculé. Mais un jour, les doutes qu'éprouvait Yoshiki depuis quelque temps se confirment : depuis sa disparition en forêt, six mois plus tôt, Hikaru a été remplacé par... "autre chose". Malgré cet effroyable constat, Yoshiki refuse d'être séparé de son ami. Il fait alors le choix de poursuivre son quotidien aux côtés de cet "être" à l'image parfaite de Hikaru. Mais au même moment, d'étranges incidents se produisent çà et là dans le village...
description.es-la:
“Así que, Hikaru ya no está… Si eso es verdad, entonces…” 

Yoshiki y Hikaru son dos chicos que viven en cierto pueblo. Tienen la misma edad y siempre han estado juntos mientras crecían. Pero, un día, Yoshiki se da cuenta que “una cosa” tomó el lugar de Hikaru. Incluso después de saber eso, Yoshiki aún quiere que estén juntos. Y así, su vida con esa “cosa” que se parece a su amigo comienza. 

Al mismo tiempo, incidentes extraños continúan ocurriendo en el pueblo...
description.pt-br:
"Então, Hikaru não está mais aqui... Se isso for verdade, então..."

Yoshiki e Hikaru são dois garotos que vivem em uma certa vila. Eles têm a mesma idade e sempre estiveram juntos enquanto cresciam. Mas, um dia, Yoshiki percebeu que "algo" havia tomado o lugar de Hikaru. Mesmo depois de descobrir isso, Yoshiki ainda quer que eles fiquem juntos. E assim, sua vida com o "algo" que se parece com seu amigo começa.

Ao mesmo tempo, incidentes estranhos continuam acontecendo na vila...

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

촬영 중 갑작스러운 사고로 북부 공작의 땅에 차원 이동한다.

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

---

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

description.en:
"Without victory, survival is impossible."

In pursuit of becoming the supreme being among all living creatures, the mad martial artist, Ma Jinwol, once turned the martial world into a sea of blood. However, after a climactic battle with the Five Masters of the World, he was sealed away. Millennia have passed… and now, he awakens, not on Earth, but on an alien planet. 

Here, at the GSP, a universal combat tournament is held once every 100 years, and he prepares to face the strongest warriors once more.
description.ko:
"승리하지 못하면 살아남을 수 없다."

모든 생물의 정점에 오르고자 과거 무림을 피바다로 만들었던 광마 ‘마진월’. 그러나 천하오절과의 싸움 끝에 광마는 봉인된다. 수천년이 시간이 흘러... 그가 눈을 뜬 곳은 지구가 아닌 외계 행성. 

이곳, 100년에 한 번 전우주 격투 토너먼트가 열리는 GSP에서다시 한번 강자들과의 싸움이 시작되려 한다.

altTitles.ja: 付き合ってあげてもいいかな

altTitles.th: ลองใจให้ตกหลุมรัก

description.en: For as long as she's known, Miwa's been into women - and now she's at university, it might finally be time for her to come out of her straight-passing shell. Of course, that takes a lot of confidence, and coming out is never easy - but could Saeko, her trashy popular weirdo of a friend, give her the help she needs - or just maybe, could the two of them be more alike than Miwa realises...?!
description.ja:
超モテるのに「好きな人と両想いになったことがない」パッと見いい女のみわ。大学入学を機に軽音サークルに入り、絶対友達にならないタイプ！と思ったお調子者の冴子と急接近。なんだかちょっと新しい扉が開いちゃう感じ…？

「せっかくだからあたしたち、付き合ってみない？」

title.en: The Genius Actor Who Brings Misfortune

description.en: “You’ll get hurt if you’re close to him.” “I don’t know why he’s so unlucky.” “Yeonjae, I’m scared of you…” “Lee Yeonjae,” avoided by everyone as if just being near him beings misfortune. Even he thinks it’s weird. Why do bad things only happen around me? I wonder how it feels to live a life of being loved and not hurting those around me. But, was even wishing for that too much? —Bam!! After an accident, I woke up in a strange place facing a mysterious entity. “Strange. You should’ve died according to your fate, so why are you still alive?” One truth I learned after meeting that entity is, [I can avoid misfortune if I act like someone else.] To survive, I have to become an actor.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

Specialized in excessive suppression, police officer Shin Hae-soo gains the ability to go back 60 minutes in time. On the day his father passed away, he instinctively knew. This was a murder disguised as a suicide. Determined to catch his father's killer, Hae-soo becomes a detective. Then, one day, following a mysterious accident, he suddenly gains a supernatural ability! As he solves criminal cases and tracks down the organization, a massive shadow begins to emerge bit by bit!

Taepyeong, a promising surgery professor, was reborn in the 19th-century English countryside village of Upton, retaining all of his memories from his past life.

He once again nurtured his dream of becoming a doctor. However, he was only met with...

altTitles.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi datta Osananajimi, Saikai Shitara Gyaru datta

altTitles.en: My Angel Childhood Friend was a Gal When We Met Again

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染BIGLOVE

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Amiga de Infância Era um Anjo, Mas Quando Nos Reencontramos, Ela Se Tornou uma Gyaru.

description.en: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
description.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった幼なじみの２人の百合です

description.en:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

Ha Maru, a butcher working at a livestock company, is invited by his supervisor to go on a business trip to Japan. However, he soon discovers that the place he has been sent to is a criminal organization run by the Yakuza. In order to survive in this dangerous environment, Ha Maru struggles and gradually awakens his hidden talent for using knives. The butcher, who has now set foot in the underworld, challenges the pinnacle of the criminal world to stay alive.

title.en: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator

altTitles.vi: Trọng SInh Đô Thị Tu Tiên

description.en: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation, having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow, despite the loss of his cultivation base, he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality, armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life, to overwrite his past mistakes, remove his lingering regrets, and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.
description.pt: Chen Fan morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.
description.vi: Truyện Trọng Sinh Đô Thị Tu Tiên được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết cùng tên của tác giả Thập Lý Kiếm Thần Bắc Huyền Tiên Tôn Trần Phàm do tu hành quá nhanh mà độ kiếp thất bại. Trở về thời niên thiếu ở trái đất, pháp bảo, thần thông, tiên khí đều không còn. Hắn nhớ lại ân oán tình thù ngày trước, quyết tâm đền bù đầy đủ, tu hành một thế, trúc vô thượng đạo cơ, rũ sạch tâm ma... thành tựu Chân Tiên đại đạo
description.pt-br: Chen Fanyu morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!

altTitles.pt-br: As Regras De Um Bom Garoto

description.en:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.
description.pt-br: Um orfanato particular na Rússia chamado “Mansão da Morte” treina crianças pequenas para se tornarem agentes. Essa é uma história que se passa no mesmo universo de Lookism.

description.en:
'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.
